name: DROP_CHASE
description:
Eye stole your DATAPAD.
He wants to know stuff he should not.
All hyped up with his enhanced neuro-cortex, breaking windows by thought.

Tough luck for him.
For you are Mohawk, and you mean business.
So please, go on and enjoy yourself.

Drop, chase, dodge, and HIT.

This is my third jam project, and first time working alone doing almost everything, except for the excellent music, courtesy of CC3.0 + Kevin MacLeod of incompetech.com.

My take on the cyberpunk jam theme, in the end I made this in around 3 days thanks to my newly bought bamboo tablet. Never used a graphics tablet before, so far it has been extremely helpful.

Made with construct2 and GIMP.

The original idea was a bit different but this is close enough, tell me what you think!
